Description: Ostracon, large fragment (two pieces now jointed) of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, interior slightly grooved, exterior covered with a light-brown slip and with one black-painted hieratic word 'wine'.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393161) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393161)
